DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective current study investigate safety tolerability BI 671800 HEA healthy Chinese male volunteer follow single oral administration , healthy Japanese male volunteer follow single oral administration multiple administration .
DOC.brief_title: Single Rising Dose ( SRD ) , Multiple Rising Dose ( MRD ) Study BI 671800 Healthy Asian Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Healthy 2 . Chinese ethnicity single rise dose ( SRD ) part , Japanese Ethnicity multiple rise dose ( MRD ) part . 3 . Age > = 20 age = < 50 4 . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) > =18.5 BMI = < 25 kg/m2 5 . Signed date write informed consent prior admission study accordance GCP local legislation Exclusion criterion : 1 . Any finding medical examination ( include blood pressure ( BP ) , pulse rate ( PR ) electrocardiogram ( ECG ) ) deviate normal clinical relevance accord investigator medical judgement 2 . Any evidence clinically relevant concomitant disease 3 . Intake drug long half life ( > 24 hour ) within least one month le 10 halflives respective drug prior administration
